title: Childs Play 2 (1990) [ENG. FRA, SPA, ITA]
description:
Technical data
Director John Lafia 
Cast Alex Vincent, Jenny Agutter, Gerrit Graham, Christine Elise, Grace Zabriskie, Peter Haskell, Beth Grant, Greg Germann, Raymond Singer 
Length 81 min 
Distributor Universal Pictures 
Discs 1 
Region 2 
Video Pal
1.85:1, 16:9 
Languages Stereo: English, French, Italian . Mono: Spanish 
Subtitles Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, English for deaf people 

Synopsis
Chuckys back! The notorious killer doll with the satanic smile comes back to life in this new chapter depicting the terrifying struggle between young Andy Barclay (Vincent) and the demonic doll attempting to possess his soul. Despite being roasted to a crisp in his last escapade, Chucky rises from the ashes after being reconstructed by a toy factory to dispel the negative publicity surrounding the doll. Back in one piece, Chucky tracks his prey to a foster home where the chase begins again in this fiendishly clever sequel to the enormously popular original.

Other features
Interactive Menus, Scene Access, Trailer
